definition.config: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="config_start" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><next><block type="config_category"><field name="name">foods</field><statement name="write"><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">lights_food</field><field name="comment">可用于恢复灯火的食物及其恢复量，“注册名, 最小恢复量/最大恢复量”，逗号后有1空格。</field><value name="value"><block type="config_textlist_variable" inline="false"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="4"></mutation><field name="name">lights_revovery</field><field name="entry0">minecraft:glow_berries, 2/3</field><field name="entry1">minecraft:golden_carrot, 1/2</field><field name="entry2">minecraft:golden_apple, 2/3</field><field name="entry3">minecraft:enchanted_golden_apple, 3/5</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="config_category"><field name="name">relics</field><statement name="write"><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">hand_strangle</field><field name="comment">其它能使收藏品扼喉之手生效的物品。最好是弩。</field><value name="value"><block type="config_textlist_variable"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="1"></mutation><field name="name">hand_strangle_recognizable</field><field name="entry0">CrossbowMod2:item.woodenCrossbow</field></block></value><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">hand_firework</field><field name="comment">其它能使收藏品烟花之手生效的物品。最好是弓。</field><value name="value"><block type="config_textlist_variable"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="1"></mutation><field name="name">hand_firework_recognizable</field><field name="entry0">twilightforest:triple_bow</field></block></value><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">hand_engrave</field><field name="comment">其它能使收藏品刻勋之手生效的物品。最好是三叉戟。</field><value name="value"><block type="config_textlist_variable"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="1"></mutation><field name="name">hand_engrave_recognizable</field><field name="entry0">iceandfire:tide_trident</field></block></value><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">crimson_treaty</field><field name="comment">其它能使收藏品绯红盟约生效的生物。最好来自下界。</field><value name="value"><block type="config_textlist_variable"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="2"></mutation><field name="name">crimson_treaty_recognizable</field><field name="entry0">cataclysm:ignis</field><field name="entry1">cataclysm:netherite_monstrosity</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></statement><next><block type="config_category"><field name="name">blocks</field><statement name="write"><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">boil_water</field><field name="comment">其它能加热热水壶的方块。最好带点火。</field><value name="value"><block type="config_textlist_variable"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="2"></mutation><field name="name">water_boil_block</field><field name="entry0">create:blaze_burner</field><field name="entry1">cataclysm:altar_of_fire</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="config_category"><field name="name">gameplay</field><statement name="write"><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">coefficient</field><field name="comment">进化点数系数，实际进化所需点数=(下一阶段代数^3)*系数。</field><value name="value"><block type="config_number_variable"><field name="name">evolution_point_coefficient</field><field name="value">200</field></block></value><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">breakable</field><field name="comment">开启后，模组生物的行为将受游戏规则：生物破坏的影响。</field><value name="value"><block type="config_logic_variable"><field name="name">enbale_break</field><field name="value">true</field></block></value><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">evosound</field><field name="comment">允许进化进入新阶段后播放音效提醒（不影响用命令调整进化时的音效）。</field><value name="value"><block type="config_logic_variable"><field name="name">enable_evolution_sound</field><field name="value">true</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
